name: com.baracuda.runtime-monitoring
description:
Note: when updating Major versions of Runtime Monitoring from the Package Manager, don't forget to remove the old version from the project before importing the new one! :)

Runtime Monitoring is an easy way for you to debug the state of your C# classes and objects during runtime.

samples.description: Contains an example scene with a FPS controller.
Contains assets to base monitoring display on IMGUI.
Contains assets to base monitoring display on Text Mesh Pro.
Contains assets to base monitoring display on UI Toolkit.
